mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.name name, b.layer layer, b.area area, b.type type, b.description description, b.version version, date_format(b.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(b.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_building b WHERE b.deleted = '0' ORDER BY b.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
